page.title: 19Sport in our villages
page.content: At our school most of the children like to join in plenty of sport.There are football teams,cricket,netball and swimming teams,and gymnastics and athletics clubs in our school.We have played a lot of friendly matches against other schools,some of them we won and some of them we lost. Football is played by 11 players on a grassy field,cricket is also played by 11 players per team on a grassy pitch,whereas netball is played by 7 players on a tarmac area. In Ravensthorpe there is an adult football and cricket team,I like watch- ing the matches which they play in the village.We normally play football in winter and cricket in the summer.My favourite sport is football,I also like to watch the school football team and cheer them on.
